comment: A very sweet man! The material is difficult but he tries to help. The accent is a little difficult to understand but you will get use to is. Ask for help as much as possible, he practically does the work for you and you still learn.

Pretty much an easy A.  He is very helpful and if you ask him a question about the lab he usually will tell you the answer or do it for you.  He is nice and jokes with the class.  He can be hard to understand with his accent, sometimes, but for the most part I had no trouble.  I would definitely recommend him!
Mr. Jachak is very helpful and a great lab teacher. He knows very well what he is doing and is a very pleasant person. I would reccomend him to anyone.

I took him for Lab he explains things very well. He will joke with you. If you have a question normally he will do the problem for you. He has a thick accent, but still are able to understand. I am taking his lab again for 1152

I had Dr. Jachak for the Chem 1151 Lab. In a class I really didn't want to be in, I was really glad I got him. He was extremely helpful, funny, and nice. I would definitely take him again. You have to do the work, just like any other class, but he will help with whatever you need.
excellent prof! so helpful. really wants you to do well but watch out for the midterm. you need to study! but it only counts as a lab grade. im takin him again for chem 2! excellent!!
Dr. Jachak is a Lab prof. He is very helpful and nice. He is always willing to help. He will stay long after everyone else has left lab. Helped me out tremendously. Highly recommended.
